examples.user_story: As a registered user, I want to log in with my email and password so that I can access my account
As a customer, I want to add items to my shopping cart so that I can purchase multiple products
As an admin, I want to delete user accounts so that I can remove inactive or banned users
As a customer, I want to search for products by name or category so that I can find what I'm looking for quickly
As a user, I want to update my profile information so that my account details are current and accurate
As a user, I want to reset my password so that I can regain access if I forget it
As a customer, I want to view my order history so that I can track previous purchases
As a shopper, I want to apply discount codes so that I can receive discounts on my purchases
As a user, I want to manage my notification preferences so that I receive only relevant communications
As a vendor, I want to upload product images so that customers can see what they're buying
As a customer, I want to filter products by price range so that I can find items within my budget
As a customer, I want to leave product reviews so that I can share my experience with other buyers
As a customer, I want to save favorite products to my wishlist so that I can revisit them later
As a customer, I want to track my shipment so that I know when my order will arrive
As a vendor, I want to manage product inventory so that I can track stock levels
As a customer, I want to checkout securely so that my payment information is protected
As a customer, I want to change shipping address before checkout so that items are sent to correct location
As a customer, I want to apply gift cards to my purchase so that I can use promotional credits
As an admin, I want to view customer analytics so that I can understand buying patterns
As a customer, I want to contact customer support so that I can resolve issues quickly
As a user, I want to export my account data so that I can backup my information
As a user, I want to enable two-factor authentication so that my account is more secure
As a customer, I want to set up subscription renewals so that I don't run out of products
As a vendor, I want to set promotional pricing so that I can run sales campaigns
As a customer, I want to compare products side by side so that I can make informed decisions
As a customer, I want to view product recommendations so that I can discover new items
As a vendor, I want to respond to customer reviews so that I can address concerns
As a customer, I want to create a profile picture so that other users can recognize me
As an admin, I want to manage product categories so that I can organize inventory
As a customer, I want to filter reviews by rating so that I can see specific feedback
As a user, I want to link my social media accounts so that I can sign in easily
As a vendor, I want to create product bundles so that I can increase sales
As a customer, I want to receive personalized email campaigns so that I see relevant offers
As an admin, I want to generate sales reports so that I can analyze business performance
As a customer, I want to pay in installments so that I can afford larger purchases
As a vendor, I want to manage shipping settings so that I can set accurate delivery times
As a customer, I want to print my invoice so that I have a physical copy
As an admin, I want to manage staff accounts so that I can control access levels
As a customer, I want to view my account balance so that I know my store credit
As a vendor, I want to set product variants so that customers can choose options
As a customer, I want to see product availability in nearby stores so that I can pick up items
As a user, I want to manage my delivery addresses so that I can ship to multiple locations
As an admin, I want to view system logs so that I can monitor platform activity
As a customer, I want to receive order alerts so that I'm informed about status changes
As a vendor, I want to customize my storefront so that my brand stands out
As a customer, I want to use voice search so that I can find products faster
As a user, I want to schedule purchases so that I can receive items on specific dates
As an admin, I want to manage banner promotions so that I can highlight offers
As a customer, I want to join loyalty program so that I can earn rewards
